mean_cn: n. 不幸事件之后果，余波
mean_en: the period of time after a bad and usually destructive event
word_etyma: after在...之后 + math割草 → 第一次割草之后 → aftermath 结果，后果
short_phrase: the aftermath of the natural disaster
sentence: We went back to see the aftermath of the tornado. There was a lot of damage.
sentence_trans: 我们回去看龙卷风过后的灾后情况，满目疮痍。
